theAya:SpeedUp.NAME: 加速
theAya:SpeedUp.DESCRIPTION: 從 *流雲疾行 和 *騰空之翼 中選擇1張 NL 加入你的手牌.
theAya:SpeedUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 從 *流雲疾行+ 和 *騰空之翼+ 中選擇1張 NL 加入你的手牌.

theAya:WingsOfAscend.NAME: 騰空之翼
theAya:WingsOfAscend.DESCRIPTION: 獲得1點 theaya:飛行 . NL theaya:風力 !M! : 額外獲得2點 theaya:飛行 . NL 消耗 .
theAya:WingsOfAscend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 獲得1點 theaya:飛行 . NL theaya:風力 !M! : 額外獲得2點 theaya:飛行 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:CloudstreamSprint.NAME: 流雲疾行
theAya:CloudstreamSprint.DESCRIPTION: 抽1張牌. NL theaya:風力 !M! : 額外抽一張牌 NL 消耗 .
theAya:CloudstreamSprint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽1張牌. NL theaya:風力 !M! : 額外抽一張牌 NL 消耗 .

theAya:SpinStrike.NAME: 旋轉打擊
theAya:SpinStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL 這場戰鬥中每次被抽到,提升 !M! 點傷害.

theAya:MapleDance.NAME: 丹楓之扇舞
theAya:MapleDance.DESCRIPTION: 獲得 !theAya:CardWindSpeed! 點 theaya:風速 . 這場戰鬥中 NL 每次被抽到, NL 提升 !M! 點風速.

theAya:SwiftWindFan.NAME: 疾風扇
theAya:SwiftWindFan.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL theaya:風力 !M! : 再攻擊一次.

theAya:TenguSpirit.NAME: 天狗之魂
theAya:TenguSpirit.DESCRIPTION: 每回合開始, NL 獲得 [E] 和50點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:GaleAssault.NAME: 狂風突襲
theAya:GaleAssault.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL theaya:風力 !M! , theaya:持續技 : NL 獲得1點 力量 ,在回合結束時失去它.

theAya:Landing.NAME: 著陸
theAya:Landing.DESCRIPTION: 獲得 !M! 點 無實體 . NL 消耗 . NL theaya:空中技 , theaya:著陸 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:WindborneGlide.NAME: 疾風翺翔
theAya:WindborneGlide.DESCRIPTION: 保留 . NL 獲得1點 theaya:飛行 NL 和15點 theaya:風速 . NL 每當被保留,耗能減1.
theAya:WindborneGlide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 , 固有 . NL 獲得1點 theaya:飛行 NL 和15點 theaya:風速 . NL 每當被保留,耗能減1.

theAya:Instamatic.NAME: 袖珍相機
theAya:Instamatic.DESCRIPTION: 選擇1張手牌, NL 獲得它的 theaya:快照 . NL 消耗 . NL 虛無 .
theAya:Instamatic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 選擇1張手牌,獲得它的 theaya:快照 . NL 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 選擇一張牌並生成1張它的快照
大新聞!
獲得快照.
消耗 .
虛無 .

theAya:SpreadRumors.NAME: 傳謠
theAya:SpreadRumors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !M! 點虛弱. NL 造成 !M! 點易傷.

theAya:TempestWrath.NAME: 暴風之怒
theAya:TempestWrath.DESCRIPTION: 每回合開始, NL 如果處於 theaya:進攻之風 , NL 獲得1點 力量 .

theAya:GentleBreeze.NAME: 清風
theAya:GentleBreeze.DESCRIPTION: 每回合開始, NL 如果處於 theaya:治愈之風 , NL 獲得5點臨時血量.

theAya:NocturnalTempest.NAME: 暗夜狂風
theAya:NocturnalTempest.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL 造成1層 theaya:顫抖 . NL theaya:風力 !M! : 額外造成1層 theaya:顫抖 .

theAya:Windsweeper.NAME: 驅風
theAya:Windsweeper.DESCRIPTION: theaya:風力 !M! , theaya:持續技 : NL 抽1張牌.

theAya:Leap.NAME: 飛躍
theAya:Leap.DESCRIPTION: 消耗1張牌, NL 獲得 !M! 點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:WindBlade.NAME: 風刃
theAya:WindBlade.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL theaya:風力 !M! : 額外造成 !D! 點傷害.

theAya:Accelerator.NAME: 極速裝置
theAya:Accelerator.DESCRIPTION: 翻倍當前的 theaya:風速 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:TheClutchClaw.NAME: 飛翔爪
theAya:TheClutchClaw.DESCRIPTION: 獲得 !M! 點 theaya:飛行 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:AirplaneMode.NAME: 飛行模式
theAya:AirplaneMode.DESCRIPTION: 每回合開始, NL 獲得4點 theaya:飛行 .

theAya:Dive.NAME: 俯沖
theAya:Dive.DESCRIPTION: 每有1點 theaya:飛行 , NL 造成 !D! 點傷害1次. NL theaya:空中技 , theaya:著陸 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:WindSurge.NAME: 風湧
theAya:WindSurge.DESCRIPTION: theaya:風力 !M! : 下回合獲得 [E] [E] . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:CrowShadow.NAME: 烏鴉的暗影
theAya:CrowShadow.DESCRIPTION: 獲得20點 theaya:風速 和3點 theaya:飛行 .

theAya:ScytheWindVeil.NAME: 鐮風面紗
theAya:ScytheWindVeil.DESCRIPTION: 獲得 !B! 點格擋 NL 和 !B! 點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:Flow.NAME: 流動
theAya:Flow.DESCRIPTION: 抽取 !M! 張手牌, NL 丟棄 !M! 張手牌. NL theaya:風力 10: 結束後再抽1張牌.

theAya:Advertisement.NAME: 廣告
theAya:Advertisement.DESCRIPTION: 選擇1張手牌獲得 theaya:快照 ,其費用加2, NL 執行X次. NL theaya:風力 100:快照不額外添加費用.
theAya:Advertisement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 選擇1張手牌獲得 theaya:快照 ,其費用加2, NL 執行X+1次. NL theaya:風力 100:快照不額外添加費用.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 選擇1張牌並生成1張它的快照
大新聞!
獲得快照.
消耗 .
虛無 .

theAya:Industrialization.NAME: 工業化
theAya:Industrialization.DESCRIPTION: 手牌中所有 theaya:快照 費用減X.
theAya:Industrialization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 手牌中所有 theaya:快照 費用減X+1.

theAya:TenguDailyReport.NAME: 天狗報當日截稿
theAya:TenguDailyReport.DESCRIPTION: 選擇1張手牌, NL 獲得兩張它的 theaya:快照 , NL 其費用加1. NL theaya:風力 !M! :快照不添加額外費用.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 選擇1張牌並生成1張它的快照
大新聞!
獲得快照.
消耗 .
虛無 .

theAya:CatapultLaunch.NAME: 彈射起步
theAya:CatapultLaunch.DESCRIPTION: 如果沒有 theaya:飛行 ,獲得5點飛行和30點 theaya:風速 ,否則獲得1點飛行.

theAya:TemporaryTruce.NAME: 暫時休戰
theAya:TemporaryTruce.DESCRIPTION: 失去二分之一的 theaya:風速 , NL 本回合不再獲得風速, NL 下回合返還2倍失去的風速.
theAya:TemporaryTruce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 失去二分之一的 theaya:風速 , NL 本回合不再獲得風速, NL 下回合返還3倍失去的風速.

theAya:FieryCombo.NAME: 火熱連擊
theAya:FieryCombo.DESCRIPTION: 本回合如果處於 theaya:進攻之風 ,每打出1張牌獲得1點 力量 . NL theaya:風力 20:先進入進攻之風.

theAya:WindShield.NAME: 風之守護
theAya:WindShield.DESCRIPTION: 本回合 NL 如果處於 theaya:抵禦之風 , NL 獲得20點防禦. NL theaya:風力 10:保留防禦到下回合.

theAya:Heal.NAME: 愈合
theAya:Heal.DESCRIPTION: 本回合如果處於 theaya:治愈之風 ,將臨時血量轉變為血量. NL theaya:風力 10:先進入治愈之風.

theAya:WindGodGirl.NAME: 風神少女
theAya:WindGodGirl.DESCRIPTION: 如果處於 theaya:翺翔之風 ,將 theaya:風速 翻 !M! 倍. NL theaya:風力 20:先進入翺翔之風.

theAya:TurbulentLand.NAME: 動蕩之地
theAya:TurbulentLand.DESCRIPTION: 進入隨機風種, NL theaya:風力 10: 獲得20點 theaya:風速 .
theAya:TurbulentLand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 進入隨機風種, NL 獲得20點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:OffensiveStance.NAME: 進攻姿態
theAya:OffensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: 進入 theaya:進攻之風 , NL 獲得3點臨時力量.
theAya:OffensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 進入 theaya:進攻之風 , NL 獲得3點臨時力量, NL 獲得10點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:ShiftingTengu.NAME: 變換的鴉天狗
theAya:ShiftingTengu.DESCRIPTION: 每次切換風種,獲得10點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:DefensiveStance.NAME: 防禦姿態
theAya:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: 進入 theaya:抵禦之風 , NL 獲得10點格擋.
theAya:DefensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 進入 theaya:抵禦之風 , NL 獲得10點格擋, NL 獲得10點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:Convection.NAME: 對流
theAya:Convection.DESCRIPTION: 每獲得30點 theaya:風速 ,對所有敵人造成3點傷害

theAya:WindCut.NAME: 風切
theAya:WindCut.DESCRIPTION: 對所有敵人造成 !D! 點傷害. NL theaya:風力 15:再攻擊1次. NL theaya:風力 30:再攻擊2次.

theAya:TenguCombo.NAME: 鴉天狗之連擊
theAya:TenguCombo.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !M! 點傷害,獲得5點 theaya:風速 ,你每次切換風種時,將這張牌從棄牌堆放回你的手牌.

theAya:WindlessWeather.NAME: 無風天氣
theAya:WindlessWeather.DESCRIPTION: 失去所有 theaya:風速 和 theaya:飛行 ,獲得 !M! 點 無實體 , 消耗 . NL theaya:風力 100: 不消耗.

theAya:Printer.NAME: 打印機
theAya:Printer.DESCRIPTION: 每回合開始, NL 選擇1張手牌獲得它的 theaya:快照 ,其費用加1.

theAya:WindTurbine.NAME: 風能發電機
theAya:WindTurbine.DESCRIPTION: 每回合開始, NL 減少20 theaya:風速 ,獲得 [E] .

theAya:CommonCold.NAME: 感冒
theAya:CommonCold.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害 NL 和3層 中毒 . NL theaya:風力 !M! : 多施加2層中毒 NL theaya:風力 !M! : NL 多施加1層 theaya:顫抖 .

theAya:StartlingTeleport.NAME: 文文的瞬間移動
theAya:StartlingTeleport.DESCRIPTION: 造成2層 theaya:顫抖 . NL theaya:風力 10:額外造成1層顫抖. NL theaya:空中技 , theaya:著陸 , 消耗 .
theAya:StartlingTeleport.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成3層 theaya:顫抖 . NL theaya:空中技 , theaya:著陸 , 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:SwiftRunning.NAME: 疾走風靡
theAya:SwiftRunning.DESCRIPTION: 獲得50點 theaya:風速 . NL theaya:風力 100: 給所有敵人2層 theaya:顫抖 . NL theaya:空中技 .
theAya:SwiftRunning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 獲得70點 theaya:風速 , NL theaya:風力 100: 給所有敵人2層 theaya:顫抖 . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:HighSpeedPhoto.NAME: 高速攝影
theAya:HighSpeedPhoto.DESCRIPTION: 隨機生成1張手牌的 theaya:快照 .

theAya:FullSpeedImpact.NAME: 全速沖擊
theAya:FullSpeedImpact.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL theaya:風力 !M! , theaya:持續技 : NL 再攻擊一次 NL 且傷害乘1.05倍.

theAya:HealingStance.NAME: 愈合姿態
theAya:HealingStance.DESCRIPTION: 進入 theaya:治愈之風 , NL 獲得5點臨時血量.
theAya:HealingStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 進入 theaya:治愈之風 , NL 獲得5點臨時血量, NL 獲得10點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:SoaringStance.NAME: 翺翔姿態
theAya:SoaringStance.DESCRIPTION: 進入 theaya:翺翔之風 , NL 獲得2點 theaya:飛行 .
theAya:SoaringStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 進入 theaya:翺翔之風 , NL 獲得2點 theaya:飛行 , NL 獲得10點 theaya:風速 .

theAya:LockOnTarget.NAME: 鎖定目標
theAya:LockOnTarget.DESCRIPTION: 每回合開始, NL 隨機給1個敵人添加 NL 1層 theaya:天狗標 和1層 theaya:黑羽 .

theAya:DexterousTengu.NAME: 鴉天狗的技藝
theAya:DexterousTengu.DESCRIPTION: 抽2張牌. NL theaya:風力 10: 再抽1張.

theAya:BouncingAya.NAME: 文文彈跳
theAya:BouncingAya.DESCRIPTION: 每一次風速歸零, NL 獲得15點 theaya:風速 NL 和1點 theaya:飛行 , NL 每回合最多10次.

theAya:SofteningClutchClaw.NAME: 飛翔爪軟化
theAya:SofteningClutchClaw.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害 NL 和 !M! 層 易傷 . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.NAME: 楓葉飛舞
theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害並獲得 NL !M! 點 theaya:風速 X次.
theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害並獲得 NL !M! 點 theaya:風速 X+1次.

theAya:YatagarasuWhirlwind.NAME: 八咫烏旋風
theAya:YatagarasuWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害, NL 如果殺死敵人, NL 本局遊戲中傷害加5. NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:FanningAssault.NAME: 急促扇擊
theAya:FanningAssault.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL 當前每有50 theaya:風速 , NL 傷害加1倍. NL theaya:風力 !M! : 再攻擊1次.

theAya:BlackFeathers.NAME: 黑羽
theAya:BlackFeathers.DESCRIPTION: 對所有敵人造成 !D! 點傷害 並施加1層 theaya:黑羽 .

theAya:FeatherStrike.NAME: 羽擊
theAya:FeatherStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害並施加 !M! 層 theaya:黑羽 .

theAya:BewitchingFan.NAME: 飄妖扇
theAya:BewitchingFan.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害並施加 !M! 層 theaya:天狗標 .

theAya:BirdGateWhirlwind.NAME: 鳥居旋風
theAya:BirdGateWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害3次. NL theaya:風力 !M! : 施加1層 theaya:黑羽 . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:ViolentNewsHarvesting.NAME: 暴力取材
theAya:ViolentNewsHarvesting.DESCRIPTION: 造成6點傷害, NL theaya:風力 !M! : NL 若手牌中有攻擊卡, NL 隨機選中1張, NL 打出其 theaya:快照 .

theAya:TenguAmulet.NAME: 天狗護符
theAya:TenguAmulet.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 . NL 被抽到後獲得 NL 20點 theaya:風速 和2點 theaya:飛行 .
theAya:TenguAmulet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 . NL 被抽到後獲得 NL 30點 theaya:風速 和3點 theaya:飛行 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 這張牌不能被打出 .

theAya:TenguGaleBullet.NAME: 天狗烈風彈
theAya:TenguGaleBullet.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL 若處於 theaya:進攻之風 , NL 傷害乘3. NL theaya:風力 !M! : 先進入進攻之風.

theAya:DanceOfWings.NAME: 羽翼之舞
theAya:DanceOfWings.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL 每有1點 theaya:飛行 , NL 傷害加 !M! . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:MapleGale.NAME: 楓華疾風
theAya:MapleGale.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害 3 次, NL 每次施加1層 theaya:天狗標 .

theAya:FanDanceStorm.NAME: 扇舞風雲
theAya:FanDanceStorm.DESCRIPTION: 造成6點傷害, NL 獲得10點 theaya:風速 NL 和1點 theaya:飛行 . NL theaya:空中技 .
theAya:FanDanceStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成9點傷害, NL 獲得15點 theaya:風速 NL 和2點 theaya:飛行 . NL theaya:空中技 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:NewsBlitz.NAME: 新聞突擊
theAya:NewsBlitz.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL 隨機獲得1張手牌的 theaya:快照 . NL theaya:空中技 .
theAya:NewsBlitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL 隨機獲得1張手牌的 theaya:快照 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必須至少有1點飛行去使用這張牌.

theAya:CeaselessShutter.NAME: 永不停息的快門
theAya:CeaselessShutter.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害. NL theaya:風力 !M! , theaya:持續技 : NL 若手牌中有攻擊卡, NL 隨機選中1張, NL 打出其 theaya:快照 .

theAya:NewspaperUpgrade.NAME: 報社產業升級
theAya:NewspaperUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: 產生的 theaya:快照 費用減1.

theAya:UnknownMaru.NAME: ？？丸
theAya:UnknownMaru.DESCRIPTION: 每回合開始, NL 給予隨機1名敵人 theaya:顫抖 .

theAya:Updraft.NAME: 上升氣流
theAya:Updraft.DESCRIPTION: 每回合結束, NL 當前 theaya:風速 每有30, NL 獲得1點 theaya:飛行 .

theAya:FastestInGensokyo.NAME: 幻想鄉最速
theAya:FastestInGensokyo.DESCRIPTION: 每回合結束, NL 當前 theaya:飛行 每有1, NL 獲得10點 theaya:風速 .
